text:
Hey <@UDK7MSQUE> thanks for this!
Another question here if you can give some thoughts..
What it would the best practises with pagination pages that comes to our report software (SEMRush) as broken links, i.e:
<https://www.roller.software/blog/tag/guest-experience/page/6>
<https://www.roller.software/blog/tag/pos/page/3>
In my understand these pages used exists before we increase the number of posts showing on each Tag page but now they are returning 404 because the amount of posts are not enough.
Any thoughts on this? I hope it makes sense, appreciate in advance.
